thread.section_title: Odeon Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Nice room in great location
thread.title_full: Nice room in great location - Review of Odeon Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Lyle N
title: Nice room in great location
text: Really liked our first stay at this hotel. This is in a great location we are familiar with. Close to Left Bank sights -- can walk to St. Germain, markets on Rue de Buci, Notre Dame, etc. Odeon Metro stop is very close. Stone wall in our room added quaint atmosphere. Breakfast could stand improvement, otherwise a great place to stay.
